Please help to improve this article by introducing more precise citations. *(April 2009)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Criminal organization **Wah Kee** (华记 Huá Jì) is a [secret society](/wiki/Secret_society) based in [Malaysia](/wiki/Malaysia) and [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) since the nineteenth century. According to the History of Wah Kee, Wah Kee (华记) was created in Singapore by Sū Guǎnghuá (苏广华). His associate Zhào Guǎnghéng (赵广恒) created Guǎng Jì (广记) in [Guangzhou](/wiki/Guangzhou), China, while Guān Fúshèng (关福胜) created Shèng Jì (胜记) in [Thailand](/wiki/Thailand), and Zhāng Xióngjié (张雄杰) created Jié Jì (杰记) in [Vietnam](/wiki/Vietnam). In the 1950s, they operated openly in the area around [Bentong](/wiki/Bentong) and placed a member on the local council of [Jemaluang](/wiki/Jemaluang). During this time, they were commonly associated with the [Malaysian Chinese Association](/wiki/Malaysian_Chinese_Association), with politician [D. R. Seenivasagam](/wiki/D._R._Seenivasagam) going so far as to describe this connection in Parliament. In recent times, they are mainly in the [Selangor](/wiki/Selangor), [Kuala Lumpur](/wiki/Kuala_Lumpur), [Melaka](/wiki/Melaka), [Penang](/wiki/Penang), [Pahang](/wiki/Pahang), [Negeri Sembilan](/wiki/Negeri_Sembilan), [Sarawak](/wiki/Sarawak), [Perak](/wiki/Perak) and other areas. In Singapore, Wah Kee is mainly in the [China Town](/wiki/China_Town) area. The triad also have some branches in [Australia](/wiki/Australia), [Thailand](/wiki/Thailand), [Vietnam](/wiki/Vietnam), [China](/wiki/China), [Hong Kong](/wiki/Hong_Kong), the [United States](/wiki/United_States), [Canada](/wiki/Canada) and [New Zealand](/wiki/New_Zealand). The Philippine Center on Transnational Crime has stated that while the Wah Kee do not operate as a traditional [triad](/wiki/Triad_(underground_societies)) per se, they are heavily involved in [heroin](/wiki/Heroin) trafficking in the region. - [Secret society](/wiki/Secret_society)
title: Wah Kee
